name: sustainedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that continues for a period of time: Her performance of Quartet No. 1 has more sustainedly passionate intensity. Blood protein levels seem to be reduced more sustainedly when the procedure is carried out in this way.
in a way that is determined: He did not seem to be sustainedly committed to the project.
More examplesFewer examplesChristianity has sustainedly explored the sense of humanity through its idea that we are all children of God.Our stressors nowadays are much more sustainedly social and psychological.He had never avoided deep thought. He had thought sustainedly all his life.
